ISSUE.TITLE: Can't access demo dashboard
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When I try to load http://rd-demo.herokuapp.com/queries I am presented with a screen asking me to choose a Google account. When I select the only account available (my Google account) the screen simply refreshes. I could access the page yesterday, but I can't see it today.
